All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractClient
AbstractClient is an abstract class which represent a general client: RMI or Socket.
App
Hello world!
Bag
The bag generates and distributes a finite arraylist of tiles, for each board a single bag is associated
Board
The board represents the entirety of the game model, it contains everything and grants access to everything using getter methods, it contains a set of common goals, a list of player the board itself made of a matrix of cells, a bag and a goal factory
BoardView
This class is used to create a view of the board, so that the client can only see the information that he needs.
Cell
Cell represents a single cell that contained a Tile
CellType
 
Client
Client is an interface which extends Remote and represents a "local" (server side) proxy of the client, called skeleton.
ClientApp
ClientApp is a class which extends UnicastRemoteObject and implements Client and AbstractClient It implements the RMI Client and all the methods through which it communicates with the RMI Server amd the ViewInterface
ClientAppSocket
 
ClientHandlerSocket

Color
 
CommonGoal
CommonGoal is an abstract class which extends the class Goal.
ConnectionType
ConnectionType is an enumeration for the type of connection: SOCKET or RMI.
ConsoleColors
 
Constant
 
EndGoal
EndGoal verify if a player is the first to finish a game and if this is true, a point is awarded to the player
GameController
Game controller controls the flow of the match, taking command using the update() method of the observable-observer pattern, it represents the entirety of the controller in the MVC patter
Goal
Abstract class for the goals, contains method to get the score of a player
GoalAngles
GoalAngles is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalColumn
GoalColumn is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalCouples
GoalCouples is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalCross
GoalCross is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalDiagonal
GoalDiagonal is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalDiffColumns
GoalDiffColumns_conf is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalDiffRows
GoalDiffRows is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalEight
GoalEight is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalFactory
this class implements getGoal method which returns a new common goal
GoalQuartets
GoalQuartets is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalRow
GoalRow is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalSquares
GoalSquares is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.
GoalStair
GoalStair is a class which extends the class CommonGoal.

NearGoal
This goal is checked at the end of a player's game and checks for clusters of tiles of the same color
PassParameters
 
PersonalGoal
represent PersonalGoal with an ArrayList of type Pgtype
Pgtype
Pgtype is the type defining Personal Goals.
Player
represent one Player with attribute nickname, chair, myShelf (Shelf type), myGoal (PersonalGoal type), score, ended and nearGoal.

RemotePlayer
 
RMIPlayer
RMIPlayer is a class which extends RemotePlayer.
Server
Server is an interface which extends Remote and represents a "local" (client side) proxy of the RMI Server, called stub.
ServerApp
 
ServerImpl
ServerImpl is a class which extends UnicastRemoteObject and implements Server It implements the RMI Server and handles all the RMI Clients which connects to it

States

represents a private message between two users with attribute sender, recipient, and content
